EmailTemplate.name: Initial alert
EmailTemplate.subject: Periodic Activity Report {!Case.CaseNumber} - Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
**This is an automated email message. When replying to this message, please KEEP THE SUBJECT LINE UNCHANGED and USE THE “REPLY TO ALL” button to keep your Honeywell CBM in all of your responses.**
Gentle notification:
Agreement Ref. No. {!Case.Reference_Number__c}
Dear Honeywell Sales Intermediary,
Pursuant to the terms and conditions of your agreement referenced above, we would like to ask you to complete the attached Periodic Activity Report form and to send it back to Honeywell by no later than {!Case.Due_Date__c}.
Should you have any questions, please contact your Honeywell Sponsor who is copied on this email.
Kind regards,
Honeywell Aerospace Team
{!Case.Thread_Id}
